title: "‘Not just promotions, go back to 75:25 ratio’"
excerpt: "The aspirants showed concerns about their future if all the positions are to be filled by promotions only. Bhavya Narasimhamurthy, president of KSCEAA, told Bangalore Mirror that they want the government to go back to its ‘75:25’ policy."
